values.extraScrapeConfigs:
- job_name: kubernetes-pods
  pipeline_stages: []
  kubernetes_sd_configs:
  - role: pod
  relabel_configs:
  - action: keep
    source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_container_name]
    regex: .*
  # DROP les fichiers trop anciens => empche les 400 futurs
  ignore_older_than: 6h

podAnnotations.security.nudger/justification: Promtail a besoin d'un positions file en criture (/run/promtail).
